description:
The Hero`s Party continued to produce results as they learned at the Adventurer`s School.
However, one thing must not be forgotten. While they were the heroines of the Hero Party, they were also still typical young girls.
Young girls who hoped to enjoy a peaceful vacation on a quiet beach.
Still, even then, they could not escape their destiny. 
And so, it came from the sea...
(Excerpt from "It Came From the Sea - Strange Tales of the Hero -")
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ocean, Swimsuits, and Slaying Evil Gods!
Umi to Mizugi to Jashin Toubatsu!
